author: ozeigermann
msg: Simplified out necessary steps from release

author: gkossakowski
msg: COCOON-2115: Implemented evaluation of sitemap expressions by using StringTemplateParser interface:
* classes extending VariableResolver are now Spring beans

* implemented LegacySitemapStringTemplateParser that uses PreparedVariableResolver for parsing expression. This class is a legacy bridge between new interfaces (StringTemplateParsing) and old implementation.

* implemented LegacySubstitutions that extend Substitutions class and supports special handling of LegacySitemapStringTemplateParser class. It was needed because sitemap has concepts (like InvocationContext) that are not present in cocoon-expression-language-api module.

* implemented StringTemplateParserVariableResolver class that allows to use StringTemplateParser as VariableResolver in sitemap. It's general purpose bridge so you can use any class implementing StringTemplateParser interface.
* adapted test cases so they can work with Springified VariableResolvers.
